verses.verse: From: James, a slave of God and of the Master Jesus, the Anointed King. To: The twelve family lines, the ones in the scattering. Welcome.
Regard it total happiness, my brothers, when you fall into being surrounded by various troubles,
knowing that the proving of your trust works on and completes persistence to do what is right.
The persistence must have a complete work so that you all may be complete and entirely whole, lacking in nothing.
If any of you lack insight, he must ask from the side of the God who gives to everyone in a dedicated way and who does not insult, and it will be given to him.
He must ask in trust, considering nothing to be wrong. You see, the person considering it to be wrong has depicted a wave of the sea made by the wind and tossed;
for that person must not suppose that he will receive anything from the side of the Master.
A double-souled man is inconsistent in all his ways.
The brother, the lowly one, must brag about his high position,
but the rich person, about his lowness because he will pass as a flower of grass.

You see, the sun ascended together with the hot wind, it shriveled up the grass, its flower fell off, and the beauty of its appearance was ruined. This is also how the rich person in his journeys will be snuffed out.
A man who persists to do what is right during trouble is blessed because when he becomes approved, he will receive the life's award wreath that the Master promised to the people loving Him.
No one who is experiencing trouble must say, "I am experiencing trouble out from God." You see, God is untroubled from bad things. He Himself does not try to cause trouble with anyone.
Each person experiences trouble as he, under his own desire, is tugged out and enticed.
After that, when the desire conceives, it delivers a baby, sin; but the sin, when it is finished off, brings death out of the womb.
Don't be misled, my loved brothers.
All good giving and every completely free gift is from above, stepping down out of the Father of the lights, beside whom there is no change or shade of turning.
He who intended it brought us out of the womb with a message of truth for the "for us to be a certain first-part-offering of His created things" part.
In such a way, my loved brothers, every person must be quick for the "to hear" part, slow for the "to speak" part, slow for rage.
You see, a man's rage does not work on and complete God's right way.
For this reason, after you put away all filthiness and overflow of badness, in submissiveness accept the implanted message, the one that is able to rescue your souls.
Become doers of the message and not just hearers, misguiding yourselves,
because if anyone is a hearer of the message and not a doer, this person has depicted a man taking a closer look in a mirror at the face of his birth.
You see, he took a closer look at himself, he has gone away, and right away he forgot whatever kind of thing he was.

But the one who stooped and peered into the complete law of the freedom and stayed with it, this one, who did not become a hearer of forgetfulness, but a doer of work, this one will be blessed in the doing of it.
If anyone among you seems to be religious as he is not bridling his tongue but fooling his heart, the religion of this person is futile.
Clean and undesecrated religion beside the God and Father is this, to be keeping an eye on orphans and widows in their hard times, to be keeping oneself unspotted away from the world.
